entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 03:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers except a few flurries over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. A few flurries over higher terrain in the morning and afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
